rows.label: qst200803_0010
rows.name: Hotaru? Is something up with that tree?

rows.label: qst200803_0020
rows.name: This one...She's hurt.

rows.label: qst200803_0030
rows.name: Hurt?

rows.label: qst200803_0040
rows.name:
Yeah. She got injured when we were
fighting those guys back there.

rows.label: qst200803_0050
rows.name:
Yeah, but...it's a tree. They patch
themselves up, don't they?

rows.label: qst200803_0060
rows.name: They're living creatures, Nia!

rows.label: qst200803_0070
rows.name:
If we just leave her like this, she might
wither and die.

rows.label: qst200803_0080
rows.name: You can't joke about that!

rows.label: qst200803_0090
rows.name: Uh, ah, sorry...

rows.label: qst200803_0100
rows.name: I didn't mean to, er, insult the tree...

rows.label: qst200803_0110
rows.name:
But...
Even if tree hurt, what can we do about it?

rows.label: qst200803_0120
rows.name: Can we heal it?

rows.label: qst200803_0130
rows.name:
I...don't know.
I'll have to do some research...

rows.label: qst200803_0140
rows.name: Maybe if we find the right kind of medicine...

rows.label: qst200803_0150
rows.name: Medicine?

rows.label: qst200803_0160
rows.name:
If it exists, I'm sure the rest of us can
help track it down.

rows.label: qst200803_0170
rows.name:
Then it's decided.
Let's heal the tree!

rows.label: qst200803_0180
rows.name: Really? You'll help me?

rows.label: qst200803_0190
rows.name:
I guess there are some people that'd be pretty cut up if this
tree died.

rows.label: qst200803_0200
rows.name: Community service, of a sort!

rows.label: qst200803_0210
rows.name: You don't mind us pitching in, do you?

rows.label: qst200803_0220
rows.name:
Not at all!
Thank you everyone!

rows.label: qst200803_0230
rows.name: Right, let's see what we can learn about her.
